title: Adda
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Organic, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Bengali, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Uses fresh vegetables produced by farmers involved with Nayakrishi Andolon, biodiversity based farming. Offers many vegetarian choices including telar pita (donut-like pita cooked in syrup), pati-shata pita (pancake style sweet pita), noksha pita (crispy sweet biscuit-like pita), vegetable kuli (pasty-like savory pita stuffed with veg), vegetable pakora, palao, fried eggplant, tomato and other bhorta.
